newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU sugar officials set molasses duties.
newsitem.headline: EU sugar officials set molasses duties.

text.p: The European Union's sugar management committee on Wednesday left molasses duties unchanged from the previous week at the maximum 0.41 ecus per 100 kg for cane and zero for beet molasses, an EU official said.

"The committee set the rates based on a reference price of 7.53 ecus per 100 kg for cane, down from 7.42 the previous week and 11.06 ecus per 100 kg for beet up from the previous week's 11.06," the official added. -- Brussels Newsroom 32 2 287 6800
